About Me

Welcome! I'm a Google Developer Expert for Web Technologies and a Senior Developer Advocate at Progress with over 15 years' experience as a web and mobile developer, specializing in creating cross-platform mobile apps. I'm a multilingual multiculturalist with a passion for hardware hacking, mobile apps, Vue.js, machine learning and discovering new things every day. I'm also the founder and CEO of Vue Vixens, an initiative promoting diversity in the Vue.js community. You can usually find me on Twitter @jenlooper.
